campaign.name: WhiteLabel Refer-A-Friend
campaign.confirmation_html: Add the sweet touch. Invite your friends to download the app, and they'll each get $3 to spend. Once they spend their $3, you'll score $3, too!
campaign.offer_html: Add the sweet touch. Invite your friends to download the app, and they'll each get $3 to spend. Once they spend their $3, you'll score $3, too!
